578:1: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma-iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayasaṃprasthitena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ādita evaṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni|
578:2: subhūtirāha-katamāni tāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
578:3: yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayasaṃprasthitena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ādita eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni?
578:4: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-buddhā eva subhūte bhagavantaḥ,
578:5: ye ca te'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvacaryākuśalāḥ,
578:8: imāni tāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni|
578:9: prajñāpāramitaiva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam|
578:10: sarvā eva ca subhūte ṣaṭ pāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni|
578:23: ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃvartante|
578:25: atra hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā pariniṣṭhitā bhavati yaduta ṣaṭpāramitāsu|
578:26: ye'pi te subhūte atīte'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya parinirvṛtāḥ,
578:29: ye'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,
578:32: ye'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvacintyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti,
578:38: ahamapi subhūte tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ|
578:42: āsu hi subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā antargatāḥ,
578:47: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭ pāramitā eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
578:60: ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya sarvajñatāyai anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiprāptaye saṃvartante|
578:63: āsu khalu punaḥ subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā,
578:64: arthataśca dharmataśca nayataścopaparīkṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā paripraṣṭavyā paripraśnayitavyā|
578:66: eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyikā saṃdarśikā avadarśikā janayitrī dhatrī|
578:68: prajñāpāramitāvirahitā hi pañca pāramitā na prajñāyante,
578:70: tasmāttarhi subhūte aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam||
578:73: subhūtirāha-syādbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa yenaivāsaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
578:76: syātsubhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa yenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
578:81: tasmāttarhi subhūte yenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā viviktā śūnyā,
578:91: na ca bhagavan viviktaṃ vā śūnyaṃ vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate|
578:96: kathaṃ vā vayaṃ bhagavan asya bhāṣitasyārthamājānīmaḥ?
578:99: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāre mamakāre caranti?
578:103: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu ahaṃkāramamakārau śūnyau?
578:106: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti?
578:109: ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti|
578:110: bhagavānāha-evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate|
578:116: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvasattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate|
578:120: evaṃ khalu subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām|
578:121: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate|
578:122: subhūtirāha-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadidaṃ sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate|
578:123: evaṃ ca bhagavaṃścaran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām|
578:124: evaṃ hi caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
578:125: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
578:127: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena|
578:128: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati,
578:131: anabhibhūtaṃ hi bhagavan buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam|
578:132: anenāpi bhagavan manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet,
578:136: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām|
578:137: evaṃ hi caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
578:138: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
578:140: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena|
578:141: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati,
578:144: anabhibhūtaṃ hi subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam|
578:145: anenāpi subhūte manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet,
578:148: sacetkhalu punaḥ subhūte ye jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ,
578:152: yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhanto yāvajjīvaṃ sarvatathāgatān satkuryurgurukuryurmānayeyuḥ pūjayeyurarcayeyurapacāyeyuḥ,
578:155: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
578:158: bhagavānāha-ataḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
578:161: yathā yathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivaṃ viharati,
578:164: tathā hi subhūte nāsti tadanyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tādṛśaṃ maitrīsahagataṃ cittam,
578:170: acintyadharmasamanvāgatā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ||
578:171: kathaṃ ca subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tāvattatpuṇyamabhinirharati?
578:172: tādṛśyā subhūte prajñayā samanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavati,
578:173: yādṛśyā prajñayā samanvāgato vadhyagatāniva sarvasattvān paśyati|
578:175: sa divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokayan aprameyānasaṃkhyeyānaparimeyānaparimāṇān sattvānānantaryakarmasamanvāgatān paśyati,
578:179: tasya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahān saṃvega utpadyate|
578:180: te cāsya sarvasattvāstayā mahāmaitryā tayā ca mahākaruṇayā sphāritvā manasikṛtā bhavanti-ahameteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyāmi,
578:182: na ca tena vā anyena vā nimittena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati|
578:183: ayamapi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahān prajñāloko'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum|
578:184: anena hi subhūte vihāreṇa viharanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvalokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ parigṛhṇanti,
578:186: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca paribhuñjate cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān,
578:188: teṣāṃ dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca dānadakṣiṇāṃ viśodhayanti|
578:190: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena amoghaṃ rāṣṭraṃ piṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ mārgamupadeṣṭukāmena vipulamavabhāsaṃ kartukāmena saṃsāragatān sattvān saṃsārātparimocayitukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ cakṣurviśodhayitukāmena anena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena manasikāreṇa vihartavyam|
578:197: tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivāni kṣapayet|
578:198: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kenacideva puruṣeṇa maṇiratnajñāne vartamānena maṇiratnajātijñena apratilabdhapūrvaṃ mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet|
578:199: sa tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabhya mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato bhavet|
578:202: tasya satatasamitaṃ tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ prati saṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ pravarteran-aho batāhaṃ tena mahāmaṇiratnena viprayukta iti hi sa puruṣastasya mahāmaṇiratnasya na vismaret yāvat tadvā anyadvā tadguṇaṃ tajjātikaṃ tena mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet|
578:203: evameva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāmahāmaṇiratnaparibhraṣṭena mahāmaṇiratnaparibhraṣṭeneva mahāmaṇiratnena ratnasaṃjñinā prajñāpāramitāmanasikārāviprayuktena prajñāpāramitāmanasikārāvirahitasarvajñatācittena tāvadanveṣṭavyā,
578:204: yāvatsā vā anyā vā pratilabdhā bhavati|
578:206: subhūtirāha-yatpunarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena virahitāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
578:207: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairavirahito bhavati?
578:208: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ manasi karoti-sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena viviktāḥ,
578:216: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
578:217: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vivardhamānayā prajñāpāramitayā bodhaye samudāgacchati,
578:219: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate vā parihīyate vā|
578:221: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
578:226: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
578:232: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate na saṃsīdati,
578:239: āha-kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra prajñāpāramitāśūnyatāyāḥ sa kaściddharma upalabhyate,
578:244: āha-kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyāṃ sa kaściddharma upalabhyate yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
578:253: āha-kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ kaścidupalabhyate,
578:256: āha-kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
578:261: evamukte-bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
578:263: bhagavānāha-samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati?
578:267: api nu sa eva dharma utpanno vā utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
578:268: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā?
578:270: bhagavānāha-evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntirevaṃrūpā bhavati|
578:271: evaṃrūpayā ca subhūte kṣāntyā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
578:272: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya vaiśāradyapratipad yāṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ caran evaṃ ghaṭamānaḥ evaṃ vyāyacchamāno'nuttaraṃ buddhajñānaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ mahāsārthavāhajñānaṃ nānuprāpsyatīti naitatsthānaṃ vidyate||
578:276: subhūtirāha-kathamasyedānīṃ bhagavan dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
578:277: bhagavānāha-kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
578:279: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛto vyākariṣyate vyākriyate vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
578:285: sarvadharmeṣu bhagavan anupalabhyamāneṣu na me evaṃ bhavati-ayaṃ dharmo'bhisaṃbudhyate,
